Name: LOTUS Minigames: Berlin Traffic
About the game: Welcome to the LOTUS minigames! Once developed as an interlude for waiting times in the LOTUS-Simulator, this game has now evolved to a stand-alone application. Berlin Traffic is a barricade-style board game. Your aim is to be the first to place one or all vehicles in the target. Your opponents can place road blocks in your way and you will have to remove them... This game is only playable via Internet from 2 up to 4 people per game. Minigames are designed to be as simple as possible. No frills, no extras - one game, one aim, one winner. The pure game, the pure fun. We hope, you enjoy!
